00039         class ValuesDialogImpl: public QDialog, public UI::Dialogs::ValuesDialog {
00040             Q_OBJECT

00043                 ValuesDialogImpl(QWidget *parent = 0, Qt::WFlags f = 0);

00047 
00048                 std::string print ();
00049 
00051                 double tmin () { return atof (Min[0]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00053                 double tmax () { return atof (Max[0]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00055                 unsigned tsteps () { return Slider[0]->value (); }
00057                 double dt () { return (tmax ()-tmin ())/double (tsteps ()); }
00058 
00060                 double umin () { return atof (Min[1]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00062                 double umax () { return atof (Max[1]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00064                 unsigned usteps () { return Slider[1]->value (); }
00066                 double du () { return (umax ()-umin ())/double (usteps ()); }
00067 
00069                 double vmin () { return atof (Min[2]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00071                 double vmax () { return atof (Max[2]->text ().toStdString().c_str()); }
00073                 unsigned vsteps () { return Slider[2]->value (); }
00075                 double dv () { return (vmax ()-vmin ())/double (vsteps ()); }
00076

00078                 virtual void accept ();
